name: fp
description: Readable, debbuggable & fast ES6 Functional Programming
author: Adrien Gibrat <adrien.gibrat@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:min
scripts.size: npm run size:src --silent && npm run size:min --silent
scripts.size:src: echo "$npm_package_name raw size `cat $npm_package_main | npm run size:format`"
scripts.size:min: echo "$npm_package_name minified & gzipped `gzip -9 -c $npm_package_min_main | npm run size:format`"
scripts.test: npm run test:partial && npm run test:curry && npm run test:compose
